name: angular-up
description: ### About  Project Zeppelin allows you to setup awesome GDG DevFest site in 5 minutes.

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -m "updates" && git push origin master
scripts.staging: npm run commit && git push origin master:staging
scripts.production: npm run commit && git push origin master:live

author: Nir Kaufman <nirkaufman@gmail.com> (nirkaufman.com)
